segments.text: Well , I've never downloaded music before . How does it work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You haven't ? If you've never tried it I can show you how .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . But why is downloading music better than buying Cds at the store ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Downloading music is really fast and convenient , and you can preview all the songs before you buy them .
segments.speaker: S2
